navigators.smart.tom

Interface TOMReceiver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServiceReplica

    public interface TOMReceiver
    Interface meant for objects that receive requests from clients

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] getState()
      This method is used by the TOM Layer to retrieve the state of the application.
      void receiveMessages(int consId, int regency, boolean fromConsensus, TOMMessage[] requests)
      This is the method invoked by the DeliveryThread to deliver a batch of messages to the receiver.
      void receiveReadonlyMessage(TOMMessage msg, MessageContext msgCtx)
      This is the method invoked by the DeliveryThread to deliver a message to the receiver.
      void setState(byte[] state)
      This method is invoked by the TOM Layer in order to ser a state upon the aplication.

    • Method Detail

      • receiveReadonlyMessage

        void receiveReadonlyMessage(TOMMessage msg,
                          MessageContext msgCtx)
        This is the method invoked by the DeliveryThread to deliver a message to the receiver. It is used to receive readonly messages. These types of messages are delivered as soon as they are received by TomLayer
        Parameters:
        msg - The request delivered by the TOM layer
        msgCtx - The context for the message being delivered to the application

      • receiveMessages

        void receiveMessages(int consId,
                   int regency,
                   boolean fromConsensus,
                   TOMMessage[] requests)
        This is the method invoked by the DeliveryThread to deliver a batch of messages to the receiver. If the receiver implements the BatchExcetutable interface, the messages are delivered as a bath. Otherwise, messages are delivered one by one.
        Parameters:
        consId - The id of the consensus in which the messages were ordered.
        regency - Regency in which the message was delivered * @param fromConsensus Set to true if this message was delivered through consensus, * false if through the state transfer protocol
        requests - The batch with TOMMessage objects.

      • getState

        byte[] getState()
        This method is used by the TOM Layer to retrieve the state of the application. This must be implemented by the programmer, and it should retrieve an array of bytes that contains the application state.
        Returns:
        An array of bytes that can be diserialized into the application state

      • setState

        void setState(byte[] state)
        This method is invoked by the TOM Layer in order to ser a state upon the aplication. This is done when a replica is delayed compared to the rest of the group, and when it recovers after a failure.
        Parameters:
        state - a byte array that is the serialization of the application's state
